title: Bug 117981: Unable to select any item on first attempt in library outline view.
description:
Description: When attempting to select any item in the library outline view, the selection does not work on the first attempt. 

Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label to a file in the library.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view.

OB: Unable to select the label item in the library outline view on the first attempt.

EB: The label item in the library outline view should be selectable on the first attempt.

SR: 
1. Add a label to a file in the library.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Try to select the label item. It should be selectable on the first attempt.
